short_summary: Supply and delivery of two hemodialysis machines to replace existing units.
description: Correctional Service Canada - Regional Treatment Centre, Abbotsford, BC require the supply and delivery of two hemodialysis machines that will replace existing units that have reached the end of their life cycle.
duration_in_months: If not specified, assume the contract may be for 7 months to 1 year.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Reference Number**
-------------------

WS4211265815-Doc4276062011

**Amendment Number**
-------------------

3

**Procurement Details**
---------------------

### Description

Correctional Service Canada - Regional Treatment Centre, Abbotsford, BC requires the supply and delivery of two hemodialysis machines to replace existing units that have reached the end of their life cycle.

### UNSPSC Category

42161600 - Extracorporeal Hemodialysis Equipment and Supplies

### Procurement Method

Competitive Bidding

### Tender Status

Expired

### Tender Details
-----------------

*   **Deadline**: 2023-12-01T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-10-17

### Regions of Delivery
----------------------

*   Canada
*   British Columbia

### Trade Agreements
-------------------

This tender is associated with the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information
----------------------

For more information, please contact Chris Morton at tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Notice URL
--------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17866470?extsite=MTc4NjY0NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
